Name: LU 721 - Zoning, DOWNTOWN FAR ROCKAWAY DEVELOPMENT PLAN, Queens (C170243(A)ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 170243(A) ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 721).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\v0\par
  By Council Members Greenfield and Richards 0\par
\par
	ab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on July 10, 2017 its decision dated July 10, 2017 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by New York City Economic Development Corporation, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section Nos. 25b and 31a, which in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate the Downtown Far Rockaway Development Plan, a comprehensive planning, zoning, and redevelopment strategy aimed at supporting Downtown Far Rockawayquote s growth and vitality by fostering a vibrant mix of residential, commercial, and community facility uses on vacant and underutilized sites near mass transit resources and along the areaquote s primary corridors, (ULURP No. C 170243(A) ZMQ), Community District 14,\cf1  \cf0\expndtw-4 Borough of Queens \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x720	x1440	x2160	qr	x9360\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x720	x1440	x2160	x2880	x3600	x4320	x5040	x5760	x6480	x7200	x7560	x7920	x8640	ab WHEREAS, the Application is related to applications N\expndtw-2  \expndtw0 170244\expndtw-2  (A) \expndtw0 ZRQ (L.U. No. 722), a zoning text amendment as modified; N 170245 HGQ (L.U. No. 723), designation of the Downtown Far Rockaway Urban Renewal\expndtw-4  \expndtw0 Area; C\expndtw-3  \expndtw0 170246\expndtw-3  \expndtw0 HUQ (L.U. No. 724), Downtown Far Rockaway Urban Renewal Plan; C\expndtw-3  170247 HDQ (L.U. No. 725), d\expndtw0 isposition of City-owned property within the Downtown Far Rockaway Urban Renewal Area; and C\expndtw-3  \expndtw0 170248\expndtw-3  \expndtw0 PPQ (L.U. No. 726), disposition of City-owned property;\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i806\li-86\qj\par
WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on July 27, 2017;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Final Environmental Impact Statement (FEIS) for which a Notice of Completion was issued on June 29, 2017 (CEQR No. 16DME010Q), which identified significant adverse impacts with respect to hazardous materials, air quality and noise which would be avoided  through the placement of (E) designations (E-415) and the Technical Memoranda dated April 26, 2017, and August 31, 2017, (the \ldblquote Technical Memorandadblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x0	x864	x2016	x3168	x4320	x5472	x6624	x7776	x8928\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x0	x720	x864	x2016	x3168	x4320	x5472	x6624	x7776	x8928 Having considered the FEIS and the Technical Memorandum with respect to the Decision and Application, the Council finds that:\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj  	ab\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i720\qj (1)	ab The FEIS meets the requirements of 6 N.Y.C.R.R. Part 617; \par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x0	x720	x1080\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i-720\li1440\qj	x0	x720	x1080 (2)	ab	ab Consistent with social, economic and other essential considerations, from among the reasonable alternatives thereto, the action is one which minimizes or avoids adverse environmental impacts to the maximum extent practicable; and\par
\par
(3)	ab	ab The adverse environmental impacts disclosed in the FEIS will be minimized or avoided to the maximum extent practicable by incorporating as conditions to the approval, those mitigation measures that were identified as practicable; and \par
\par
(4)	ab	ab The Decision, together with the FEIS and the Technical Memorandum, constitute the written statement of facts, and of social, economic and other factors and standards that form the basis of this determination, pursuant to 6 N.Y.C.R.R. 'a7617.11(d).\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x0	x720	x1260	x1440	x1620\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 170243(A) ZMQ, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision as follows:\par
\pard\ltrpar	ab\par
\pard\ltrpar
